title: Crispy fillet steak with chilli sauce and lime lemongrass pilau
description: Fillet steak is given a kick of oriental spicing here along with a fragrant citrus pilau rice and a deliciously sticky sauce.
ingredients: 1 lemongrass stem, outer leaves removed and finely diced
3 tbsp fresh coriander leaves, roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
10cm/4in piece fresh ginger, peeled and finely grated
